product_name: Nike Studio Wrap 2 Print Shoes - Women's
long_description: Nike Studio Wrap 2 Print Shoes are designed to help you make the most of workouts that you typically do in bare feet, including yoga, dance, Pilates, cardio workouts and strength training.
short_description: Nike Studio Wrap 2 Print Shoes are designed to help you make the most of workouts that you typically do in bare feet, including yoga, dance, Pilates, cardio workouts and strength training.
